attributes.action: Make  crimes such as murder, pedophillia and GBH punishable by death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I certainly don't want murderors, yobs and peodophils in the country in which I live. The world would be a safer place without them - and they deserve it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
